It's been thousands of years since I've been hurt this much..."},{"lineNumber":264383,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかして、もしかして、殺されてしまうのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be, could it be, that I'll be killed...?"},{"lineNumber":264384,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、ありえない、こんな小さな連中に・・だが、万が一・・いや、百分の１ぐらいは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it's impossible, by such small beings... but, just in case... no, maybe about a one percent chance..."},{"lineNumber":264385,"originalJapaneseLine":"そ、そうだな・・私はいずれ魔王になるんだ、ここでいったん引いて","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yeah... I will become the Demon King eventually. Let's talk."},{"lineNumber":264389,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスといったな、人間だがお前はなかなかやるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"You said your name is Rance, a human? You're quite capable."},{"lineNumber":264390,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここまで戦った事に敬意を表して俺の副官にしてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"In honor of the fight up to this point, I'll make you my deputy."},{"lineNumber":264391,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界全体は私が支配するが、お前には人類圏を支配させてやろう","translatedEnglishLine":"I will rule the entire world, but I will let you rule the human realm."},{"lineNumber":264392,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界の半分をやるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll give you half of the world."},{"lineNumber":264393,"originalJapaneseLine":"断る・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I refuse..."},{"lineNumber":264394,"originalJapaneseLine":"何が望みだ","translatedEnglishLine":"What is your wish?"},{"lineNumber":264395,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハーレムうんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"Something about a harem."},{"lineNumber":264396,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、それもかなえてやろう。世界中の美女、人間も女の子モンスターも全て","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I will grant that too. All the beautiful women in the world, both humans and female monsters,"},{"lineNumber":264397,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前の物だ。これでいいだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"are yours. Is this good enough?"},{"lineNumber":264398,"originalJapaneseLine":"（　くだらん夢だ、そうだ・・女でも与えておき、こいつはしょせん人間。","translatedEnglishLine":"(What a trivial dream. Yes... just give him women, he is after all a mere human."},{"lineNumber":264399,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　魔人にさえしなければ、いずれ老いて死んでいく　）","translatedEnglishLine":"As long as I don't make him a demon, he will age and die eventually.)"},{"lineNumber":264400,"originalJapaneseLine":"断る・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I refuse..."},{"lineNumber":264401,"originalJapaneseLine":"欲しい物は全て自分の力で勝ち取る","translatedEnglishLine":"I will win everything I want through my own power."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あらら・・何か身体が変だわ・・でも、もう腐っているから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh dear... My body feels strange... But it's already decayed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーーにも感じないわ、ほほほほ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't feel anything at all, hohohoho.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バイランローズとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Bailan Rose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラがお手伝いしますと戦闘に参加する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera joins the battle saying she will help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラの能力については、シャングリラのケイブリス戦で見せたのと同じ物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera's abilities are the same as those shown in the Cave Kris battle in Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [２６０／３／シャリエラ合流]の所でユーザーに思い出せてあげておいて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please have the user recall this at [260/3/Shariera joins].

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バイランローズとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Bailan Rose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Content undecided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラルートの場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If on the Shariera route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラの使用は控えないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Usage of Shariera should be limited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が仲間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad joins as allies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城内に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enter the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊の薬で恐瘴気対策
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Countermeasure against toxic miasma with Maelita squad's medicine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリスの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Cave Kris' room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てを殺して一人で悲しんでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having killed everything, she mourns alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋の前・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the room...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の様子がおかしい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki's behavior is odd...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cave Kris' room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺戮の部屋に立つケイブリス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cave Kris stands in the room of slaughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Cave Kris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラが戦闘に参加する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera joins the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Cave Kris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラが戦闘に参加する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera joins the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント　体力が半分になったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Cave Kris: when her health drops to half.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達のシーン、かなりピンチな様子で書いて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Write the scene with Rance and the others in a very desperate situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか戦っているが、無茶苦茶強い・・倒せるのか本当に・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are fighting somehow, but she is insanely strong... Can they really defeat her...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん引いて体制を整えた方がとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe they should retreat for a moment and regroup...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諦めるな、ここで逃げては駄目だ、全てを振り絞って根性で戦え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't give up. Don't run away here. Fight desperately with all your strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの様子、体力半分ほど減らさせれた。まだまだ余裕なのだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cave Kris' condition: about half her health has been reduced. She still seems confident though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内心として焦る、なんだ・・こいつらは、私がこんなに傷付けられたのは何千年ぶりだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Internally, she's panicking. What... are these guys? It's been thousands of years since I've been hurt this much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして、もしかして、殺されてしまうのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be, could it be, that I'll be killed...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、ありえない、こんな小さな連中に・・だが、万が一・・いや、百分の１ぐらいは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's impossible, by such small beings... but, just in case... no, maybe about a one percent chance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そうだな・・私はいずれ魔王になるんだ、ここでいったん引いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yeah... I will become the Demon King eventually. I should withdraw for now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、魔王になってから奴らを倒した方が楽だし、安全じゃ無いか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, after becoming the Demon King, it would be easier and safer to defeat them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスとの戦闘中・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle with Cave Kris...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、まて・・ちょっと待て・・　話し合おう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-wait... just a moment... Let's talk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスといったな、人間だがお前はなかなかやるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You said your name is Rance, a human? You're quite capable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで戦った事に敬意を表して俺の副官にしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In honor of the fight up to this point, I'll make you my deputy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界全体は私が支配するが、お前には人類圏を支配させてやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will rule the entire world, but I will let you rule the human realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の半分をやるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll give you half of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断る・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I refuse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何が望みだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is your wish?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハーレムうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something about a harem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、それもかなえてやろう。世界中の美女、人間も女の子モンスターも全て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I will grant that too. All the beautiful women in the world, both humans and female monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の物だ。これでいいだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are yours. Is this good enough?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　くだらん夢だ、そうだ・・女でも与えておき、こいつはしょせん人間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (What a trivial dream. Yes... just give him women, he is after all a mere human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人にさえしなければ、いずれ老いて死んでいく　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As long as I don't make him a demon, he will age and die eventually.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断る・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I refuse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 欲しい物は全て自分の力で勝ち取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will win everything I want through my own power.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あらら・・何か身体が変だわ・・でも、もう腐っているから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh dear... My body feels strange... But it's already decayed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーーにも感じないわ、ほほほほ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't feel anything at all, hohohoho.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バイランローズとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Bailan Rose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラがお手伝いしますと戦闘に参加する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera joins the battle saying she will help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラの能力については、シャングリラのケイブリス戦で見せたのと同じ物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera's abilities are the same as those shown in the Cave Kris battle in Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [２６０／３／シャリエラ合流]の所でユーザーに思い出せてあげておいて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please have the user recall this at [260/3/Shariera joins].

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バイランローズとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Bailan Rose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Content undecided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラルートの場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If on the Shariera route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラの使用は控えないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Usage of Shariera should be limited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が仲間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad joins as allies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城内に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enter the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊の薬で恐瘴気対策
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Countermeasure against toxic miasma with Maelita squad's medicine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリスの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Cave Kris' room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てを殺して一人で悲しんでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having killed everything, she mourns alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋の前・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the room...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の様子がおかしい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki's behavior is odd...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cave Kris' room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺戮の部屋に立つケイブリス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cave Kris stands in the room of slaughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Cave Kris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラが戦闘に参加する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera joins the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Cave Kris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラが戦闘に参加する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shariera joins the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスとの戦闘中、割り込みイベント　体力が半分になったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle with Cave Kris: when her health drops to half.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達のシーン、かなりピンチな様子で書いて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Write the scene with Rance and the others in a very desperate situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか戦っているが、無茶苦茶強い・・倒せるのか本当に・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are fighting somehow, but she is insanely strong... Can they really defeat her...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん引いて体制を整えた方がとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe they should retreat for a moment and regroup...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諦めるな、ここで逃げては駄目だ、全てを振り絞って根性で戦え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't give up. Don't run away here. Fight desperately with all your strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの様子、体力半分ほど減らさせれた。まだまだ余裕なのだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cave Kris' condition: about half her health has been reduced. She still seems confident though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内心として焦る、なんだ・・こいつらは、私がこんなに傷付けられたのは何千年ぶりだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Internally, she's panicking. What... are these guys? It's been thousands of years since I've been hurt this much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして、もしかして、殺されてしまうのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be, could it be, that I'll be killed...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、ありえない、こんな小さな連中に・・だが、万が一・・いや、百分の１ぐらいは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's impossible, by such small beings... but, just in case... no, maybe about a one percent chance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そうだな・・私はいずれ魔王になるんだ、ここでいったん引いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yeah... I will become the Demon King eventually. I should withdraw for now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、魔王になってから奴らを倒した方が楽だし、安全じゃ無いか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, after becoming the Demon King, it would be easier and safer to defeat them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスとの戦闘中・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle with Cave Kris...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、まて・・ちょっと待て・・　話し合おう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-wait... just a moment... Let's talk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスといったな、人間だがお前はなかなかやるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You said your name is Rance, a human? You're quite capable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで戦った事に敬意を表して俺の副官にしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In honor of the fight up to this point, I'll make you my deputy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界全体は私が支配するが、お前には人類圏を支配させてやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will rule the entire world, but I will let you rule the human realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の半分をやるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll give you half of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断る・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I refuse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何が望みだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is your wish?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハーレムうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something about a harem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、それもかなえてやろう。世界中の美女、人間も女の子モンスターも全て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I will grant that too. All the beautiful women in the world, both humans and female monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の物だ。これでいいだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are yours. Is this good enough?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　くだらん夢だ、そうだ・・女でも与えておき、こいつはしょせん人間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (What a trivial dream. Yes... just give him women, he is after all a mere human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人にさえしなければ、いずれ老いて死んでいく　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As long as I don't make him a demon, he will age and die eventually.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断る・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I refuse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 欲しい物は全て自分の力で勝ち取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will win everything I want through my own power.
